trans-unit.source: To successfully complete this section, you must have a working installation of Node.js and the Azure SDK for Node.js for your platform.
trans-unit.target: To successfully complete this section, you must have a working installation of Node.js and the Azure SDK for Node.js for your platform.

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure SDK for Node.js: Windows installer | Mac installer | Linux download
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure SDK for Node.js: Windows installer | Mac installer | Linux download

trans-unit.source: If you are using Mac or Linux, install Node.js from http://nodejs.org.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Mac or Linux, install Node.js from http://nodejs.org.

trans-unit.source: The Windows installer already includes Node.js.
trans-unit.target: The Windows installer already includes Node.js.
